snippet.title: Lucky Hunter Release Date Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam Page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2824310/

Get ready to hunt! Lucky Hunter, an indie deck-building auto battler roguelike, officially launches on Steam on November 5, 2024!

Developed by the one-person indie team 159 Studio and published by indienova, the game will be available at $5.99 with a 20% discount for the first two weeks!

After a successful demo during Steam Next Fest with over 30,000 players, Lucky Hunter has evolved thanks to community feedback. Players can expect new decks and refined mechanics in the full release.

Game Features:

- Explore procedurally generated hunting maps and choose routes to face battles, shops, enchantments, and events.
- Auto-battling mechanics allow you to focus on building unique decks and relics, exploiting synergies between pieces.
Combine pieces into higher-level ones to create a formidable force.
- Build your deck from over 50 pieces and 50 relics, and survive increasingly fierce attacks from prey.
- Experience growth after each adventure, unlocking new mechanics and strengthening your base attributes.

159 Studio’s first game Lucky Hunter is packed with strategic layers and exciting surprises. Add it to your wishlist and grab the launch discount on November 5th!
